Plot: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).
Title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Movie
Writer: Michael J. Nelson, Trace Beaulieu, Jim Mallon, Kevin Murphy, Mary Jo Pehl, Paul Chaplin, Bridget Jones, Joel Hodgson (television series "Mystery Science Theater 3000")
